ISSUE.TITLE: Colloection IN operations perform Contains not IN
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Collection A IN Collection B Should do Collection B containsAll Collection A, but it does the opposite. This applies to all collection operators (IN, NOTIN, ANY, NOTANY) incase of input type = collection.
